titleStmt.title: The return of the sword or a divine prognostick delivered in a sermon at Newcastle : manifesting that breach of covenant is a prognostick of the return of the sword. / By Robert Jenison. Dr. of D.
titleStmt.author: Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, for Luke Favvne, at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
